item.title: UnitedHealth Group abruptly replaces CEO Andrew Witty, deepening a terrible year
item.description: The health care conglomerate is facing mounting financial problems – and ongoing consumer anger over high costs and denied claims.

item.title: Inflation cools in April — but tariffs could upend the picture in coming months

item.title: Champagne-makers mull if it's time to move on from the U.S. market
item.description: Amid uncertainty around President Trump's tariffs, some Champagne-makers say they're losing trust in the U.S. market.
